author: Philip Jeyaretnam JC:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Suit No 868 of 2019 (Registrar’s Appeals 53 and 54 of 2021)
casename: Ooi Say Peng and another v Koh Kai Chuan Raymond and others
counsel: Edwin Lee Peng Khoon (Eldan Law) (instructed) and Tay Siok Leng Josephine (Josephine Tay & Co) for the plaintiffs; Choa Sn-Yien Brendon and Lim Jia Xin Kimberly (Patrick Ong Law LLC) for the fourth defendant; Gokulamurali s/o Haridas, Linisha Kapur Supramaniam and Ng Si Xuan Sancia (Tito Isaac & Co LLP) for the fifth and sixth defendants;

headings.text: The plaintiff’s claim against the fourth, fifth and sixth defendants
Whether and to what extent the claims against the fourth, fifth and sixth defendants should be struck out
